Race.SpecificTitle: PW HRC Amendment Prop. No. 1 -- Section 1-02 - City-Parish Council
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall Section 1-02 of the Lafayette City-Parish Consolidated Government Home Rule Charter be amended to provide that the plan of government provided by this home rule charter shall be known as the "Mayor/President-Council" form of government, and shall all sections of the Lafayette City Parish Consolidated Government Home Rule Charter that refer to the "President" be amended to replace "President" with "Mayor/President"?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW HRC Amendment Prop. No. 2 -- Section 4-10(A) - City-Parish Council
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall Section 4-10(A) of the Lafayette City-Parish Consolidated Government Home Rule Charter be amended to provide that the planning and zoning commission shall consist of seven (7) members appointed by the City-Parish Council for five (5) year staggered terms as determined by the Council with four (4) members who shall be qualified electors residing within the corporate limits of the City of Lafayette and three (3) members who shall be qualified electors residing within the parish in an area outside the corporate limits of any municipality and for vacancies on the commission to be filled by the Council?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Cons. Sch. Dist. No. 1 -- 7.27 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Consolidated School District No. 1 Proposition
(Maintenance Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafayette, State of Louisiana, continue to levy a seven and twenty-seven hundredths (7.27) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $14,236,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public elementary and secondary schools in said District?
